title: Initial Development
content: During this stage we worked to implement the basis and overall framework of the server.

title: Playtest 1
content: This is where we will be testing the server with a small group of players to find bugs and gather feedback.

title: Development Phase 2
content: During this phase we will be working to fix bugs discovered during the playtest, as well as working on new features.

title: Playtest 2
content: In the second playtest we will once again be bug hunting and gathering feedback but with a larger group of players.
